project_abstract.cdata: The development objectives of the Andhra Pradesh State Highway Project are to: 1) reduce transport costs and transport constraints on economic activity; and 2) improve the state's institutional capabilities to manage road programs and assets.  The project consists of the following components: (i) widening and strengthening of priority roads, including civil works, design and supervision and land acquisition, resettlement and rehabilitation; (ii) maintenance of state roads, comprising works and technical assistance for maintenance management; (iii) reform and strengthening of the State road agency, including technical assistance, training and equipment; and (iv) repayment of Project Preparation Facility.
